bestIdea.name: The Ruins of Detroit
bestIdea.description: Explore the decaying urban landscape of Detroit, a city once thriving with industry, now marked by abandoned factories, crumbling buildings, and graffiti-covered walls. This route takes you through the heart of the city's decline, showcasing the stark reality of urban decay.

otherIdeas.name: The Wastelands of Chernobyl
otherIdeas.description: Journey through the abandoned city of Pripyat, near the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant. This route takes you through the eerie, deserted streets and buildings left behind after the 1986 disaster, offering a haunting glimpse into a world frozen in time.

otherIdeas.name: The Streets of Mega-City One
otherIdeas.description: Navigate the sprawling, dystopian metropolis of Mega-City One from the Judge Dredd universe. This route takes you through the towering city blocks, crime-ridden streets, and the oppressive atmosphere of a city on the brink.

otherIdeas.name: The Ruins of Neo-Tokyo
otherIdeas.description: Explore the post-apocalyptic landscape of Neo-Tokyo, a city rebuilt after a devastating explosion. This route takes you through the neon-lit streets, abandoned skyscrapers, and the remnants of a once-great city.
